snippet: Monsters and murders of the Victorian age come alive in Showtime's new supernatural drama "Penny Dreadful," as actor Josh Hartnett leads a band of gothic mavericks to uncover the terrors that attack the city of London....

headline.print_headline: Actor Hartnett Takes on Mystery and Monsters in 'Penny Dreadful'
headline.main: Actor Hartnett Takes on Mystery and Monsters in 'Penny Dreadful'

lead_paragraph: Monsters and murders of the Victorian age come alive in Showtime's new supernatural drama "Penny Dreadful," as actor Josh Hartnett leads a band of gothic mavericks to uncover the terrors that attack the city of London.
